channel.title: maven on I'm company
channel.description: Recent content in maven on I'm company

item.title: Maven发布401问题排查
item.description: 日志问题现象 Caused by: org.apache.maven.shared.transfer.artifact.deploy.ArtifactDeployerException: Failed to deploy artifacts: Could not transfer artifact com.aa.bb:client:jar:1.0.0-20191231.021137-1 from/to company::default (http://test.company.local/nexus/repository/maven-snapshots): Transfer failed for http://test.company.local/nexus/repository/maven-snapshots/com/aa/bb/client/1.0.0-SNAPSHOT/client-1.0.0-20191231.021137-1.jar 401 Unauthorized 根据提示，401未授权，表面来看就是发布的权限未认证 排查步骤 settings文件是否配

item.title: 那些有用maven命令
item.description: 查看当前系统的配置信息 排查问题可以查看当前maven所依赖系统的所有变量(系统变量或者环境变量)信息 mvn help:system 查看当前有效的settings文件 m
